practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Personal Injury|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Wrongful Death|Trucking Accidents|Brain Injury|Birth Injury
description:
In Bend, Oregon, when consumers are harassed by credit unions, banks, mortgage companies, credit-reporting agencies and collection agencies, they come to the law office of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys to handle their case and provide a successful plan for a stable financial future. We handle matters of Chapter 7, Chapter 13, Chapter 11 and Chapter 12 bankruptcies for those who are struggling under the pressure of overwhelming debt.

Our service area extends throughout the state of Oregon and the Tri-County area of Washington, and our law office is also here to represent those who have been involved in a personal injury. Whether an auto accident, pedestrian accident, motorcycle accident, wrongful death, brain injury, birth injury or trucking accident, we do not stop until our clients have compensation for their injuries and inconvenience.

Dealing with bankruptcy or an unexpected injury can be extremely frustrating and overwhelming, and we take a thorough, kind approach to securing compensation and finding customized solutions to every problem our clients face. Those who have questions about their case or situation should visit our office for a free initial consultation with a qualified attorney.

With over 30 years of experience, the law office of Olsen Daines Bankruptcy Attorneys has filed nearly 30,000 cases in the last 15 years. Our solutions are realistic, our attorneys are available seven days a week, and we handle cases for both businesses and individuals. Credit card payments are accepted at our office, and we will work tirelessly to discharge taxes, stop license suspension, stop foreclosures and restore peace to the lives of our clients.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
